title: Inked
description: It all starts with a one-night stand...AMANDAMen like Nick should come with a warning label... "don’t touch." He walked into the shop, smelling like heaven, wanting his first tattoo, and I should have refused his business. Because I knew the moment I set eyes on him, I didn’t stand a chance. Still, I fell down the rabbit-hole with him.Now, he’s gone, moved on, and the result of our one-night stand is left growing inside me. I’ll probably never see this man again.NICKIt was only supposed to be a little ink. A parting gift to myself from myself. Because when your girlfriend dumps you for a famous rockstar, you leave. You move on. You get the hell out of town and forget all about her. But I never counted on meeting Amanda right before I left. Or the night we shared. Or the mark she left when she put her ink on my skin.I have to go back. For her.**INKED is a full-length standalone set in Sarah Darlington’s Kill Devil Hills world.
author: Sarah Darlington
